channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems Demand Faster Inspector Review of ICE Actions
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security's inspector general is reviewing how federal immigration agents handle and respond to use-of-force complaints.
